dcterms:creator: Lizhen Nie
Mao Ye
Dan Nicolae
dcterms:description: A dataset with a total of 6 randomly generated covariates and a single treatment with dosage ranging from 0 to 1 that involve complex functions for both treatment assignment and outcome function.
dcterms:title: Fully synthetic

dcterms:creator: Jennifer L Hill
dcterms:description: The original semi-synthetic IHDP dataset contains binary treatments with 747 observations on 25 covariates. This dataset is adapted to the continuous dosage context by changing the treatment assignment and outcome function.
dcterms:title: IHDP-continuous

dcterms:creator: David Newman
dcterms:description: The News dataset consists of 3000 randomly sampled news items from the NY Times corpus, originally introduced as a benchmark in the binary treatment setting. The treatment and outcome are generated in a similar way as previous works.
dcterms:title: News
